name: Castelli Astratta Jersey - Women's
description: You're serious about your rides, but that doesn't mean you don't like to have fun. Colourful graphics give playful style to this light and airy jersey.Strada mesh front and back panels have plenty of stretch for a perfect fit.Sleeves and side panels are dimpled open mesh for excellent venting.Full-length YKK® Vislon® zipper.3 rear pockets store what you need.Gripper hem with a drop tail provides good coverage.
